title: ☀️ $350 Off Summer Savings!
posting_body: Receive $350 off your first full months rent on a 12 month lease when you move into your new home by 8/15/22!
Aspen Lake offers superbly styled apartment with an accent of homespun charm.

Each of our suites are thoughtfully designed to give you more useful living space and features such as an open kitchen, in-suite washer and dryer, a walk-in closet, ceiling fans, blinds on all the windows, and patios or balconies.
The community has a heated outdoor pool, fitness facility, and business center.
Our community is minutes from the Brunswick Recreation Center, RTA bus lines, I-71, and the Ohio Turnpike.
Come home to your quite hideaway nestled in the heart of Brunswick.
*Pricing and availability are subject to change at any time.
